definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: How do you find an ‘Island of Misfit Foods’ near you?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何尋找周圍的“非適當食品小島”的呢？

sentences.english: He angled the camera in the correct postion.
sentences.chinese: 他把照相機調到了適當的角度。

sentences.english: It is shown that the SOR method is convergent if the over relaxation parameter is properly chosen.
sentences.chinese: 證明了在適當的選取松馳因子，SOR方法是收斂的。

sentences.english: NOTE Data should be compared with those of competitors andor appropriate benchmarks .
sentences.chinese: 數據應該與競爭對手和或適當的基準的數據相比較。

sentences.english: The right style of swimsuit can help by hiding bulges .
sentences.chinese: 款式適當的游泳衣有助於掩飾肥胖部位。

sentences.english: E. If the enclosing sides adjoin each other, the area should be properly vented.
sentences.chinese: 如果封閉的側面彼此鄰接，該區域要有適當的通風。

sentences.english: Housework done properly can kill you.
sentences.chinese: 適當地幹家務活會殺了你。

sentences.english: The table includes the appropriate number of columns and a corresponding name.
sentences.chinese: 表包括適當的列數和相應名稱。

sentences.english: An appropriate number of rooms in another hotel must be tentatively reserved.
sentences.chinese: 須在另一家酒店暫時預訂適當的房間數。

sentences.english: S36/37Wear suitable protective clothing and gloves.
sentences.chinese: 穿戴適當的防護服和手套。

sentences.english: So the headline and the story line has to be re-edited properly.
sentences.chinese: 所以故事標題和內容應該適當被重新編輯。

sentences.english: Are in-stock and in-process materials properly identified and controlled?
sentences.chinese: 是否對在倉庫和在製程的物料進行適當地標識和控制？

sentences.english: The appropriate files are downloaded to the local machine.
sentences.chinese: 把適當的文件下載到本地機。

sentences.english: It is polite and proper to lift small bowls of rice or soup when you eat.
sentences.chinese: 當你喫小碗米飯或湯時，把它端起來是禮貌和適當的。

sentences.english: The stronger anti-cold ability of 'Lihong' suggested that the cultivation district of this variety could appropriately be expanded to the north.
sentences.chinese: 該品種具有較強的抗寒性，栽培區域可適當北擴。

sentences.english: Three kinds of children is certain to consider suitable cures in winter.
sentences.chinese: 有三類孩子的確需要考慮在冬天適當進補。

definition: timely/apt to the occasion/in due course
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
